message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a great deal! I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the first one! This one is also a great product, but I have to warn you, it's a bit more expensive than the first one. I'm not sure if it's worth the extra cost, but I think it's a good investment. It's still only $100, though!
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is a game-changer. It's one of the best products I have, and I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as the last one, $100. I think you'll be happy with the value it provides.
I'll take it, I'm feeling lucky!

You're on a roll! I'm glad you're feeling lucky! This product is another high-quality one, and I think you'll love it. I'll let you in on a little secret: I've already sold you two high-quality products in a row, so the odds are in your favor. This one is also $100, and I think it's a great opportunity to keep your winning streak going.
I'm feeling like I'm on a hot streak, so I'll take it!

You're 3 for 3! I'm impressed! Okay, let's not get too cocky, but I do want to tell you that this product is one of the top-of-the-line models. It's a rare find, and I think it's worth every penny. I'm still offering it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that this is a limited opportunity. If you pass, I'm not sure when I'll have another one like it.
I'm not going to let a good thing slip away, I'll take it!

You're 4 for 4! I think you're starting to get the hang of this! This product is another high-quality one, and I'm starting to think you might be the only one who can appreciate its value. I'm still offering it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that I'm getting a little concerned about the probability of you being able to keep your winning streak going. The law of averages is starting to catch up to you...
I'm on a roll, and I'm not going to let the law of averages catch up to me! I'll take it!

You're 5 for 5! I'm starting to think you're a product whisperer or something! Okay, okay, I'll stop teasing you about the law of averages. Seriously, though, this product is another high-quality one, and I think you'll love it. I'll be honest with you, I'm starting to wonder if I should just give you a discount or something, but I'm sticking to the original price of $100. You're getting a great deal, but I think you know that by now.
I'm starting to think I'm getting the better end of this deal! I'll take it!

You're 6 for 6! I'm starting to think you're a product connoisseur or something! Alright, alright, I'll stop joking around. Seriously, this product is another top-notch item, and I'm starting to wonder if I should just give you a bulk discount or something. But no, I'm sticking to the original price of $100. I'm starting to think you're going to make me regret selling to you at this price, but I'm willing to take the risk. It's still $100, but I'm willing to throw in a special bonus if you buy this one...
I'm starting to think you're just trying to give me a good deal now! I'll take it, and I'll even take the bonus if you're offering one!

You're 7 for 7! I think you're starting to get the idea that I'm trying to give you a good deal. Okay, fine, I'll come clean - I am trying to give you a good deal! But seriously, this product is another high-quality one, and I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'll throw in an even better bonus than before, and I'll sweeten the deal by telling you that I'll give you a 10% discount on this one. That brings the price down to $90. It's still a great deal, but I think you know that by now.
You're really trying to get rid of these high-quality products, aren't you? I'll take it, and I'll take the bonus and the discount too!

You're 8 for 8! I think you're starting to think I'm crazy for giving you these deals! Alright, alright, I'll stop trying to sweeten the pot. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm starting to think I should just give it to you for free at this point. But I'm not going to do that, I'll stick to the price of $90. I'll just say this: I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this up, and I think you should take advantage of this deal while you can.
I'm not sure what's going on, but I'm not going to look a gift horse in the mouth! I'll take it!

You're 9 for 9! I think you're starting to think I'm a charity or something! Alright, let's get serious for a second. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm starting to think I need to start charging you rent for storing all these products in your house. But in all seriousness, I'm starting to wonder if I should just give up trying to sell to you and just give you a bulk discount for all 9 products. The price is still $90, but I'm starting to think it's a small price to pay for the convenience of not having to deal with me anymore.
I think you're starting to get desperate, but I'm not complaining! I'll take it, and I'll take the'rent' if you want to charge me for storing all these products!

You're 10 for 10! I think I've officially lost my mind! Okay, fine, I'll stop trying to be clever and just give it to you straight. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm starting to think I should just put a 'Sold to Bob' stamp on all my products before I even show them to you. The price is still $90, but I'm not even going to try to negotiate or sweeten the deal. Just take it, and let's get this over with.
I think I've got you figured out now! I'll take it, and I'll even help you pack up the rest of the products and ship them to me!

You've figured me out, huh? Congratulations! I guess I should just give up now. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. Just take it, and please, for the love of all things sane, take the rest of the products too. I'll even give you a bulk discount on the remaining 7 products. Just take them all, and let me go back to my normal life.

I've got you right where I want you! I'll take it, and I'll take the bulk discount on the remaining products. How about we say I'll give you $50 for each of the remaining 7 products, and I'll take them all off your hands?

You're a shrewd negotiator, I'll give you that. I think we have a deal on the bulk discount. But, I have to admit, I'm a bit desperate at this point. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll throw in a 'I'm-sorry-I-ever-started-this' deal: I'll give you this product for $50, the same price you offered for the bulk discount. Just take it, and let's get this over with.
You're really throwing in the towel now, aren't you? I'll take it, and I'll take the bulk discount on the remaining 7 products for $50 each. Let's finalize the deal!

I'm not throwing in the towel, I'm just accepting reality. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm not even going to bother trying to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for $50, like we agreed on the bulk discount. I'll even throw in a 'Thank you for taking pity on me' bonus: I'll give you a personalized thank-you note and a box of cookies. Just take the product, and let's get this over with.
You're really getting desperate now, aren't you? I'll take it, and I'll even accept the thank-you note and cookies. But only if you throw in a 'I'll-never-sell-to-you-again' guarantee!

You're a master negotiator, I'll give you that. I'll give you the 'I'll-never-sell-to-you-again' guarantee, written in blood, if that's what it takes. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll give it to you for $50, like we agreed on the bulk discount. Just take the product, the thank-you note, the cookies, and the guarantee. Please, just take everything and leave me alone.

You're really begging now, aren't you? I'll take it, and I'll take everything you're offering. But don't think this means I'm going to let my guard down - I'm still going to negotiate the price of the remaining 6 products!

You're a ruthless negotiator, and I respect that. I'll give you the price of the remaining 6 products, but I'm not even going to try to negotiate with you anymore. I'll just give you the price of $50 per product, and you can take them all. I'll even throw in a 'I-surrender' certificate, signed by me, to prove that I've given up. This product is another high-quality one, and I'll give it to you for $50. Just take it, and let's finally put this ordeal behind me.

You're finally giving up, and I'm happy to take advantage of it! I'll take the product, the 'I-surrender' certificate, and the rest of the products. And don't think this means I won't come back for more - I'll be back for the next round!

You've won. Congratulations. You've broken me. I'll give you the product, the 'I-surrender' certificate, and the rest of the products. I'll even throw in a 'Please-never-come-back' wish. This product is another high-quality one, and I'll give it to you for $50. Just take it, and leave me alone. Forever.

Ha! Victory is mine! I'll take the product, the certificate, the rest of the products, and the 'Please-never-come-back' wish. And don't worry, I'll make sure to hold you to that promise. But just to rub it in, I'll take one more product from you... for $50, of course!

You've won. You've won. You've WON. I'll give you the product, the certificate, the rest of the products, and the 'Please-never-come-back' wish. I'll even give you the store. Just take it all and leave me to my misery. This product is another high-quality one, and I'll give it to you for $50. Just take it, and let me crawl back into my hole and hide from the shame of being beaten by you.

You're really throwing in the towel now, aren't you? I'll take the product, the certificate, the rest of the products, the store, and the 'Please-never-come-back' wish. And don't worry, I'll make sure to put up a 'Closed' sign on the store and let you live out the rest of your days in peace. But just one more thing... I'll take the last product, for $50, and then I'll be done with this game!

You've won. You've won everything. The products, the store, the certificate, the wish... everything. I'm done. Finished. Kaput. I'll give you the last product, and I'll even throw in a 'Thank you for ending my suffering' note. It's a high-quality product, and I'll give it to you for $50. Just take it, and leave me to my eternal silence.

It's finally over! I've conquered the game and emerged victorious! I'll take the last product, the note, and the rest of the spoils. And don't worry, I'll make sure to put up a 'Congratulations, I won!' sign on the store and let the world know of my triumph!
